name: OgdenWealth
0: ”Alexa, ask Ogden Wealth to play the latest update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ogden wealth
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Learn about financial planning and the latest insights from Ogden Wealth:

Enable this Skill then say, "Alexa, open Ogden Wealth." 

Once open, you can say, 

"Tell me about the company."
"Tell me about the services."
"Tell me about Michelle Ogden."
"Tell me about the team."
"Tell me about the philosophy."
"Tell me about the Return on Life."
"Play the latest update."

Try a one-shot phrase: "Alexa, ask Ogden Wealth to tell me about the services."

About Ogden Wealth:
We’re dedicated to providing you with the highest level of service and delivering trust, transparency and accountability to ensure you have a personal experience with your advisor. Our mission is to empower you to live a life by design, not by default. 

We strive to do the complex work for you and help provide the guidance along the way so YOU can focus on WHAT MATTERS MOST and pursue the best “RETURN ON LIFE” possible. 

At Ogden Wealth it is our goal to inspire you to live your life by design – not by default. Once you share with us what that looks like for you, we’ll help you make wise decisions along the way that support that preferred future. 

Making the best decisions can only be pursued by providing you with the tools and education required to stick with the plan. We also help you see visually how the right (or wrong) decisions impact your tomorrow in order to keep you on track. 

Throughout our process, you gain a complete view of your wealth and understand each of the integrated components including: 

• Life Planning – What truly matters to YOU 
• Disciplined Portfolio Management 
• Risk Management 
• Estate Planning 
• Tax Planning 
• Planned Giving / Philanthropy / Legacy Planning

Connect:
Website: ogdenwealthllc.com

Request a demo to launch your mini-podcast and custom Alexa Skill like this at WealthVoice.ai

Disclaimer:
Investment advisory services offered through CWM, LLC, an SEC Registered Investment Advisor. Reviews received on this profile may or may not be from a verified client, and as such may or may not reflect real-life experiences of individuals who used our services. Individual results vary, and CWM, LLC does not claim, nor should the reader assume, that any individual experience recounted are representative of what anyone using our services may experience.
